item.title: Head of Kuwait Specialty Field Hospital in Gaza Says Israeli Strike Killed a Guard
item.description: Israel’s military did not immediately comment on the report, which came two days after it attacked the Ahli Arab Hospital in Gaza City.

item.title: Sandstorm Turns Iraq’s Skies Orange and Sends Thousands to Hospitals
item.description: Climate experts say such storms are becoming more frequent and severe in the country. This was its worst of the year so far.

item.title: Stocks Edge Higher as Investors Assess Tariff Scenarios
item.description: The Trump administration’s chaotic tariff rollout continues to spur volatility in the markets.

item.title: Trump Administration Will Freeze $2 Billion After Harvard Refuses Demands
item.description: Federal officials said they would freeze the money after Harvard said it would not submit to requests to overhaul hiring and report international stud...

item.title: Why Trump Could Lose His Trade War With China
item.description: The Times Opinion columnist discusses what he thinks Trump — and American policymakers — misunderstand about China in the escalating trade war.
